items.name: Green Arrow
description: The Green Arrow is an upgraded arrow.
It requires the Green Arrow's Bow to shoot.

items.name: Air Totem Body
description: The Air Totem allows the user to manipulate air.
Ability 1: Fire an air jet which pushes back entities
Ability 2: Fire an air jet downwards pushing you up
Tip: Jump right before using Ability 2 to go even higher up!
Be careful, this item doesn't stop fall damage!

items.name: Water Totem
description: The Water Totem Allows the user to manipulate water
Ability 1: Fire a water jet damaging opponents
Ability 2: Fill empty buckets with water
Passive ability: When in water you gain dolphin's grace

items.name: Fire Totem Body
description: The Fire Totem allows the user to manipulate fire.
Ability 1: Shoot a fireball
Ability 2: Fill empty buckets with lava
Passive ability: Fire resistance

items.name: The Hood
description: Use this for protection, or more importantly to look cool.

items.name: The Quiver
description: Use the ability keys to switch between arrow types.
Normal: A standard arrow
Explosive: An arrow that explodes on impact
Grapple: An arrow that sends you to it

items.name: The Arrow's Leggings
description: Use this for protection, or more importantly to look cool.

items.name: The Green Arrow's Boots
description: Use this for protection, or more importantly to look cool.

items.name: Earth Totem
description: The Earth Totem allows the user to manipulate earth.
Ability 1: Ores near you glow (including through blocks)
Ability 2: Change which ores to target

items.name: Spirit Totem Body
description: The Spirit Totem allows the user to control animals
Ability 1: Gain Strength 2 for 10 seconds
Ability 2: Tame and ride animals
Passive ability: When in water you gain dolphin's grace

items.name: Death Totem
description: The Death Totem allows the user to manipulate death.
Passive ability: Instant respawn and no items lost on death
Note: The death totem doesn't have any active abilities because of the powerful passive ability it has.

items.name: Green Arrow's Bow
description: The bow can shoot Green Arrows
Use The Quiver to shoot different types of arrows
